conduits.name: Harm Denial
conduits.description: Expel Harm's healing is increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Inner Fury
conduits.description: Fists of Fury's damage is increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Calculated Strikes
conduits.description: Spinning Crane Kick's bonus from striking a unique target with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick is increased by an additional <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Coordinated Offensive
conduits.description: When Storm, Earth, and Fire spirits fixate on the same target, they deal <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> additional damage.

conduits.name: Xuen's Bond
conduits.description: Abilities that activate Combo Strikes reduce the cooldown of Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger by 0.5 sec, and Xuen's damage is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Grounding Breath
conduits.description: When casting Vivify on yourself, its heal is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>, and it has a chance to refund its cost.

conduits.name: Jade Bond
conduits.description: Abilities that activate Gust of Mist reduce the cooldown on Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 0.5 sec, and Yu'lon's Celestial Breath healing is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Resplendent Mist
conduits.description: Gust of Mists has a 30% chance to do <dynamic>25% - 40%</dynamic> more healing.

conduits.name: Fortifying Ingredients
conduits.description: Fortifying Brew grants you a shield equal to <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> of your health for 15 sec.

conduits.name: Lingering Numbness
conduits.description: When Paralysis ends, your target's movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>60% - 90%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Dizzying Tumble
conduits.description: Targets affected by your Leg Sweep deal <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> less damage for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Swift Transference
conduits.description: Transcendence: Transfer increases your movement speed by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Tumbling Technique
conduits.description: Blackout Kick has a <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> chance to grant a charge of Roll.

conduits.name: Rising Sun Revival
conduits.description: Rising Sun Kick reduces the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

conduits.name: Scalding Brew
conduits.description: Keg Smash deals an additional <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic> damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.

conduits.name: Celestial Effervescence
conduits.description: While under the effects of Celestial Brew, your effects that heal you are increased by <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Nourishing Chi
conduits.description: Life Cocoon increases healing over time received by an additional <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic>, and this bonus lingers for an additional 6 sec after the shield is broken.

conduits.name: Evasive Stride
conduits.description: Shuffle grants your Stagger <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> additional effectiveness.

conduits.name: Walk with the Ox
conduits.description: Abilities that grant Shuffle reduce the cooldown on Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox by 0.5 sec, and Niuzao's Stomp deals an additional <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> damage.

conduits.name: Strike with Clarity
conduits.description: Weapons of Order's duration is increased by 5 sec, and the Mastery bonus is increased by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Bone Marrow Hops
conduits.description: Bonedust Brew's Shadow damage or healing is increased by <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic>, and when Bonedust Brew deals Shadow damage or healing, it reduces its cooldown by 0.5 sec.

conduits.name: Imbued Reflections
conduits.description: Fallen Order monks deal <dynamic>20% - 50%</dynamic> more damage and healing.

conduits.name: Way of the Fae
conduits.description: Faeline Stomp deals <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> additional damage per target, up to a maximum of <dynamic>50%</dynamic> additional damage.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Weapons of Order
covenants.description:
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 15%. Additionally, 

<spec>Windwalker</spec>
<dynamic>Rising Sun Kick cooldown is reset instantly and your Rising Sun Kick reduces the cost of your Chi Abilities by 1 for 5 sec</dynamic>

[Keg Smash cooldown is reset instantly and enemies hit by Keg Smash take 5% increased damage from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.]

<spec>Mistweaver</spec>
<dynamic>Essence Font cooldown is reset instantly and heals nearby allies for (240% of Spell power) health on channel start and end</dynamic>

covenants.name: Faeline Stomp
covenants.description:
Strike the ground fiercely to expose a faeline for 30 sec, dealing (60% of Attack power) Nature damage

<spec>Brewmaster</spec>
<dynamic>and igniting enemies with Breath of Fire</dynamic>

<spec>Mistweaver</spec>
<dynamic>and healing allies with an Essence Font bolt</dynamic>

<spec>Windwalker</spec>
<dynamic>and ripping Chi and Energy Spheres out of enemies</dynamic>

Your abilities have a 10% chance of resetting the cooldown of Faeline Stomp while fighting on a faeline.

covenants.name: Bonedust Brew
covenants.description:
Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for 10 sec.  Your abilities have a 15% chance to affect the target a second time at 25% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

<spec>Mistweaver</spec>
<dynamic>Gust of Mists heals targets with your Bonedust Brew active for an additional (33.75% of Attack power)</dynamic>

<spec>Brewmaster</spec>
<dynamic>Tiger Palm and Keg Smash reduces the cooldown of your brews by an additional 1 sec. when striking enemies with your Bonedust Brew active</dynamic>

<spec>Windwalker</spec>
<dynamic>Spinning Crane Kick refunds 1 Chi when striking enemies with your Bonedust Brew active</dynamic>

covenants.name: Fallen Order
covenants.description:
Opens a mirror for 24 sec, summoning reflections of your order's fallen Ox, Crane, and Tiger adepts every 1 for 6 sec.

Fallen Monks that have mastered [Ox][Crane][Tiger] Style will also [attack your enemies with Breath of Fire][heal with Enveloping Mist][assault with Fists of Fury] and assist for an additional 2 sec.

legendaries.name: Ancient Teachings of the Monastery
legendaries.description: Your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick and Rising Sun Kick heal for 120% of the damage done to an injured ally within 20 yards.

legendaries.name: Celestial Breath
legendaries.description: Activating Thunder Focus Tea causes you to exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 6 allies within 15 yards for [(40% of Spell power) * 3] over 2 sec.

legendaries.name: Stormstout's Last Gasp
legendaries.description: Keg Smash deals 30% additional damage, and has 1 additional charges.

legendaries.name: Mighty Pour
legendaries.description: Celestial Brew increases your Armor by 15% for 7 sec, and Purifying Brew has a 15% chance to not consume a charge.

legendaries.name: The Emperor's Capacitor
legendaries.description: Chi spenders increase the damage of your next Crackling Jade Lightning by 100% and reduce its cost by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

legendaries.name: Fatal Touch
legendaries.description: Touch of Death cooldown reduced by 60.

legendaries.name: Invoker's Delight
legendaries.description: You gain 12% haste for 338321until cancelled after summoning your Celestial.

legendaries.name: Rushing Tiger Palm
legendaries.description:
Tiger Palm now has a 10 yard range, and increases your critical strike chance for 25% for 6 sec on the target. When used, you instantly dash to the target.

The increased critical strike effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec per target.

legendaries.name: Soothing Focus
legendaries.description:
Healing with Enveloping Mists or Vivify while channeling Soothing Mists increases their healing done by 15% and reduces their mana cost by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times.

When your Soothing Mists channel ends, this effect is cancelled.

legendaries.name: Uplifting Mists
legendaries.description:
Renewing Mists applies Extend Life to the initial target, instantly healing them for 50 and increasing all healing done to them by 15% for 12 sec. 

When you heal with Enveloping Mist or Vivify, 50% of the heal is also applied to targets with your Extend Life effect.

legendaries.name: Xuen's Battlegear
legendaries.description:
When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 30% for 5 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 1.5 sec.

legendaries.name: Pressure Release
legendaries.description:
Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 20 stacks.

Using Expel Harm will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing (40% of Attack power) damage to all enemies within 8 yards. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.

legendaries.name: Face Palm
legendaries.description: Tiger Palm has a 10% chance to deal 300% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.

legendaries.name: Flaming Kicks
legendaries.description: Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 30% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Flame on the target.
